title: Colin Quinn | Trump and the GOP Are Trying to Cover Up What Happened on January 6: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Republicans fully embracing Trump as he still tries to cover up what happened behind the scenes on January 6.

Then, Colin Quinn talks about how the anti-smoking law changed the ecosystem in New York City, how he really feels about the United States and his show The Last Best Hope.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
